cards.content: Data is now considered the most valuable commodity on earth, outshining oil and gold. ThreeFold provides a new paradigm that allows anyone, like you, to participate in the Internet economy.

header.subtitle: Decentralization is taking over
header.content: Emerging technologies demand edge solutions to scale. ThreeFold created secure and scaleable technology at the edge that allows anyone to connect capacity, anywhere.

headerSolution.subtitle: Join the Most Advanced Edge Network
headerSolution.content: With significant storage and compute capacity already available around the globe, the most advanced P2P network continues to expand.
